original: HELLMANN, Gösta Wilhelm, Disponent, v. Konsul, Norrköping, f Nrkp 17/3 99 av disp M H o Inga Askerberg, gm Karin Levi-Carlsson. Nrkps h a l, Nrkps hdlsgymn fackk, spec.kurs v Leeds Univ. Disp o vkst dir sed. 32 i AB Max Hellmann yllefabr Nrkp (se vid und C F Hellm). Deläg o styr.led i detta. Finl v. kons Nrkp. Kapt sjöv.kår o ch Ögl sjöv.flottilj, led ögls o Sörml hdlskamm, styr f J o M Lennings sjukhem, Nrkps hdlsfrn, barnkrubba, mm. Styr.led förs.AB Mälaren, Sthlm, Färgeri- o AppreturAB, Nrkp, AB Ind.tomten, Nrkp. Studieres Engl, Frankr, Tyskl, Finl 20—23. RVO, SvFMGM, fmflGM, Sthlm.fmflGM, östergötl.v.lfbSM, KERKO2kl, RFinlVROlkl, FFrk4kl, FSftjM, FMM. Frimurare, W6, NeptO, KAK, KMK, KSAK. Hobbies: Motorsport o segling. °HELLSÉN, Einar Lorentz, Direktör, Göteborg, f Arbrå, Gävleb l, 19/1 93, gm Ellen Larsson. Anst i Norrländska Automobilaff i Bollnäs 10—13, start tills m broder bilsk i Söderhamn 13, eg bilsk i Halmst 18, överg däreft t bilhdln, auktor Ford-försälj 23, repr f General Motor fi år, start AB Bil & Truck i Gbg 29, ensamförsälj f Volvo inom Gbgs-distr 38. Led av centralstyr o arb.utsk i Sv Automobilhandl.frb, styr.led i Bilverkstädernas Arb.giv.frb samt ordf i Gbgs Bilverkstäders Frn. Inneh Sv Motorfrbs utm f prickfri körning (körkort sed. 10).
translated:
HELLMANN, Gösta Wilhelm, Manager, also Honorary Consul, Norrkoping, b. in Norrkoping on March 17, 1899, to Mr. H and Mrs. Inga Askerberg; married to Karin Levi-Carlsson. Educated at Norrkoping's primary school and high school, specialized course at Leeds University. Has been a manager and executive director since 1932 at AB Max Hellmann wool factory in Norrkoping (see further information under C.F. Hellm). Part-owner and board member of the same. Honorary Consul of Finland in Norrkoping. Captain in the Merchant Navy and Ögl Naval Flotilla, member of Ögl's and Sörml's Chamber of Commerce, board member of J and M Lennings Hospital, Norrkoping's Trade Association, children's nursery, and others. Board member of AB Mälaren in Stockholm, Färgeri- and AppreturAB in Norrkoping, AB Ind.tomten in Norrkoping. Studied in England, France, Germany, and Finland from 1920 to 1923. Decorations: RVO, SvFMGM, fmflGM, Sthlm.fmflGM, östergötland's lfbSM, KERKO2kl, RFinlVROlkl, FFrk4kl, FSftjM, FMM. Freemason, member of W6, NeptO, KAK, KMK, KSAK. Hobbies: Motorsports and sailing. 

HELLSÉN, Einar Lorentz, Director, Gothenburg, b. in Arbrå, Gävleborg County, on January 19, 1893, married to Ellen Larsson. Employed at Norrland's Automobile Shop in Bollnäs from 1910 to 1913, started a car business with his brother in Söderhamn in 1913, owned a car school in Halmstad in 1918, then switched to car trading, authorized Ford dealer from 1923, representative for General Motors for several years, started AB Bil & Truck in Gothenburg in 1929, exclusive distributor for Volvo in the Gothenburg district from 1938. Member of the central board and labor committee of the Swedish Automobile Dealers Association, board member of the Automobile Workshops Employers Association, and chairman of the Gothenburg Automobile Workshop Association. Holds the Swedish Motor Association's commendation for flawless driving (driver's license since 1910).
